blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: Why is no one talking about how Dan lied in his insta story? He said he still had straight hair from PINOF but that would mean...
question: Why is no one talking about how Dan lied in his insta story? He said he still had straight hair from PINOF but that would mean he hasn’t showered in days and he’s wearing the same sweater as the video so obviously the photo was taken that day
answer:
I mean, I’m not sure that’s quite enough to prove a lie.


You can shower every day without washing your hair or getting it wet. It’s what shower caps are for and we don’t know Dan’s shower/hair routine.


I can’t speak for y’all but if I’m not going anywhere sometimes I skip the shower for a couple days.


People wear their clothes more than once.


Is it probably a lie? Maybe. Is it definitely a lie? No.

I can’t speak for y’all but if I’m not going anywhere sometimes I skip the shower for a couple days.

Is it probably a lie? Maybe. Is it definitely a lie? No.

blog.name: phanfeed-ao3
blog.title: Phanfiction!
blog.description:
!!! READ THE FAQ BEFORE SENDING ME AN ASK !!!

Mobile Links

This blog is autoposts anything that gets put in the Dan Howell/Phil Lester tag on Archive of Our Own (AO3).

Sometimes the applet on IFTT I use straight up breaks. I don't recommend turning on notifications for this blog. Links don't work on mobile.

Admin: Ozzy (foolishdeadbeat)
